overview: The story is set in a rainforest full of squarish plants which controlled by the Mother Tree. However it is only the main character, Bijiï¼ˆcircle seeds) who are different , who wanted to express his own through dancing. Throughout some struggle and discover, they found out that each of the seeds are different, and they are potentially to become any plants they wanted to be.
title: Biji
